scripts.buildhugo: go clean -C hugo && env GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 CGO_ENABLED=1 go build -C hugo -ldflags='-s -w' --tags extended -o ../bin
scripts.buildjs: npx mkdirp assets/js && sed '94,309d;467,589d;593,597d;615,636d;639,642d;696,697d;716d;722,727d' themes/FeelIt/assets/js/theme.js > assets/js/theme.js
scripts.deploy: npm run buildjs && rm -f -r docs && ./bin/hugo --gc --minify && git add docs && git commit -S -s -m 'docs: Re-generate fixes'
